divs: Sighting DetailsI have been seeing ufo's over years both in daylight and night time. Some I have seen very close where I could see the portals. One was shouded in a cloud type that was also witnessed by my boyfriend in Switzerland at 2:00 a.m. It seemed to be hovering close to our balcony with the light pointed to the ground and rotating one direction and then the other. I tried to take a photo, but nothing came out. It did not seem to be doing anything so I went back to bed. Also in Switzerland,there was one always hovering over the Juras Mountains. I decided to photograph it and when I did the camera went off with individual clicks. Thought the camera malfunctioned, so went inside to look. To my surprise, there were 12 individual photos of symbols. I have no idea what they mean... Usually when I see one, if they are not doing to much, I go inside. At first I was bedazzled by them. Now is can get tiring except for a couple of photos and audio that I would like to know what it is about.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Pittsfield
There were no other sightings in Pittsfield on or around June 19th 2010
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: I have seen many over the past few years. I ave seen them up close and far away.
